scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push
scripts.dev-backend: cd server && go build -o server.exe && server.exe
scripts.deploy-all: concurrently "npm run deploy-frontend" "npm run deploy-backend" "npm run heroku-logs" "npm run commit" "npm run deploy-serverless"
scripts.deploy-backend: cd server && godep save ./... && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push heroku master && cd ..
scripts.deploy-frontend: cd client && yarn build && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy-serverless: cd serverless/functions/ && firebase deploy --only functions && cd ..
scripts.heroku-backend-refresh: cd server && heroku apps:destroy --app $npm_package_config_servername --confirm $npm_package_config_servername && git init && git add . && heroku create $npm_package_config_servername; cd .. && npm run deployb
scripts.heroku-logs: cd server && heroku logs -a cavalry-app --tail && cd ..
